newsitem.title: TURKEY: Istanbul bourse opens 20 minutes late.
newsitem.headline: Istanbul bourse opens 20 minutes late.

text.p: A technical problem delayed the start of trading on the Istanbul Stock Exchange by twenty minutes on Thursday, officials said.
The exchange opened at 0820 GMT after the problem, linked to the introduction today of new price indices, was solved, an official said.
He said the morning session will close 10 minutes late at 1010 GMT.
